mapper.insert: insert into book.t_book (typeid, isbn, title, authors, pressid) values (#{typeId}, #{isbn}, #{title}, #{authors}, #{pressId})
mapper.update: update book.t_book set typeid=#{typeId}, isbn=#{isbn}, title=#{title}, authors=#{authors}, pressid=#{pressId} where bookid = #{bookId}
mapper.select: select * from book.t_book where book.t_book.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') order by t_book.bookid
select codeid,codename from book.code_booktype order by codeid
